author: Emily Heller
title: Lurking through Hulu’s sizable horror movie collection
description: The streaming service is home to plenty of scares, from Bong Joon-ho’s masterpiece social satire, Parasite, to classic Stephen King adaptation Misery.
content: Back in February, Polygon rounded up the best horror movies recently dropped onto streaming services. When youre in the mood for some spooks, thats a great place to start. But if youre specifically browsing Hulu for horror, weve got you covered there too. Whe… [+8550 chars]
